Articles.Content:
Question, is it possible to go into the folders and move parts around so they appear in certain tabs but not others? I know you can create custom tabs, but I'm familiar with the stock tabs. So, for example, I have the robotics mod and it has its own tab for robotics, Great! But it also puts its parts into the utility folder. 
Anyone know how to do this myself? 
Again, the in game custom tabs is not an option.

Yes, it's possible.

Go into the folder that contains the part, and find the .cfg file.  Open in a text editor, find the line that says "category = X" and change X from what it is to what you want it to be.  Save file, part moved.

And then someone will tell you how to do it with Module Manager, probably.

Thanks

I tried what you said, however it only shows one category listed, but the part is still in 2 spots. Maybe sub category?

Hrm.  I know I've done it before.  It was probably in an older version of KSP, though.

Rereading your post though, it looks like something else is going on.  I don't think I've dealt with mods that add categories to the tabs.
